parameters.name: From
parameters.description:
The source of the request. Default value: **aqs**. Valid values:

*   **sas**: Security Center.
*   **aqs**: Server Guard.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group that you want to query.

>  You can call the [DescribeAllGroups](~~130972~~) operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The name or public IP address of the asset.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
